thread.title: CLOWN NEWS NETWORK: CNN just did a segment on Trump and stairs
thread.title_full: CLOWN NEWS NETWORK: CNN just did a segment on Trump and stairs

author: Greg P.
title: CLOWN NEWS NETWORK: CNN just did a segment on Trump and stairs
text:
CLOWN NEWS NETWORK: CNN just did a segment on Trump and stairs Posted at 9:59 am on March 22, 2017 by Greg P. 
Us: “Can the media’s coverage of President Trump get any worse?” 
CNN: “Hold my beer.” BREAKING NEWS: CNN just had a segment about whether or not President Trump is afraid of stairs. 
— Emily Ochsenschlager (@NPREmily) March 22, 2017 
And it wasn’t just a quick clip, mind you. It was a full segment: CNN just did a 10 minute story on how Trump is afraid of stairs. I hate cable news (all of it) #thatincludesyoufoxnews 
— Scott Hutcheson (@jScottHutcheson) March 22, 2017 "Why do people hate the media?" 
CNN: "Allow me to demonstrate." pic.twitter.com/fxbznXUgOx 
— Seth Mandel (@SethAMandel) March 22, 2017 Trending 'Just suddenly wake up?' Samantha Power's 'total lack of self-awareness' is stunning 
Does CNN not get that it’s coverage like this that only makes Trump stronger? @SethAMandel There is so much to criticize Trump for, but crap like this will only strengthen his base and bring more people into his tent.
